body.name: Sonic The Hedgehog 2.5" Action Figure Death Egg Playset with Sonic
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 13 mins
features: Kids and fan can recreate epic battles from the Sonic the Hedgehog world with the Death Egg Playset!
The playset towers at 12” tall and includes a 2.5-inch scale Running-styled Sonic figure
Slide the Sonic figure along one of two tracks inside Death Egg playset, and use your skill to target the Egg Heart
Strike the Egg Heart to defeat Dr. Eggman and watch it explode!
After defeating Dr. Eggman, put the Egg Heart back together to play all over again.
Assembly required - Suggested for kids ages 7 years and up
body.description: "Sonic the Hedgehog is one of the world’s most iconic video game characters of all time. Along with his friends Tails, Knuckles and Amy, Sonic speeds around the planet to battle injustice and defeat his arch nemesis, the evil Dr. Eggman. Kid and fans can recreate the action from the world of Sonic the Hedgehog with the Death Egg Playset. Sonic faces Dr. Eggman again, but this time inside the Death Egg for an epic battle! The notorious Dr. Eggman sits in the Egg Heart as you run Sonic around the track to defeat him! Switch to a different track to find the perfect angle of attack. Time it right to strike the Egg Heart multiple times to defeat Dr. Eggman and watch it explode. The playset comes with an exclusive Running-Sonic figure and Death Egg on a stand. Reassemble the Egg Heart to battle again. The Death Egg Playset stands over 12-inches high and is great to display in your home. There are two tracks that you can move Sonic along. Guide your Sonic figure around the track to do a 360 spin! The track works with the included Sonic figure and other Sonic 2.5” Figures from JAKKS (other figures sold separately. Performance may vary with each figure). Build your world of Sonic the Hedgehog toys from Jakks by adding more Sonic friends, playsets and accessories (each sold separately). The playset does not use batteries. Assembly required. Some children will require assistance with assembly."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Larger than I expected!
reviews.reviewText: This Sonic playset is a dream come true for Sonic fans, but it comes with a few challenges. It arrives in a large, branded box that hints at the adventures inside. Assembling it can be a bit tricky, and the instructions aren't the clearest, making adult assistance essential, especially when putting the rings together. Don't toss aside those gray plastic pieces in the packaging – they're crucial for building the egg!Once you've conquered the assembly, this playset truly shines. It includes two figures, Sonic and Dr. Eggman, perfect for igniting your child's Sonic passion. The Death Egg's attention to detail is impressive, and it stands as a solid, eye-catching centerpiece. While the track assembly might pose a challenge for a child, it's nothing a bit of teamwork can't solve.This playset's size may surprise you, requiring a larger shelf for display, but the end result is undoubtedly cool. The Death Egg's size is impressive, and its goal is to reach Dr. Eggman's heart – a thrilling adventure for Sonic enthusiasts. Watching your child play with it is a joy, and it'll keep them entertained for hours.In the end, it's a fantastic addition to any Sonic collection, both as a plaything and a display piece. If you know a Sonic fan, this playset is an ideal gift that will keep the Sonic magic alive in your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Gave this to my nephew and he has played with it for months. Good quality materials, looks good, and holds up to extensive use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This toy is a waste of money! My 8 year old sonic obsessed son was completely underwhelmed with this toy. It’s hard to put together so they will constantly need you to help realign it, the parts bend and are cheap plastic. It would have to be something that just sits on the shelf and you look at otherwise it’s going to make both the kid and parent left frustrated! Don’t waste your time or money on this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a cool gift for the Sonic fans. Its a nice size and requires some assembly, so be prepared to help as there is a distinct lack of instructions. Its a nice set with Sonic and Mr. Eggman. The quality is a bit lacking, especially since it is a licensed product but the kiddos seem to like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars kiddo is totally hooked
reviews.reviewText: We got this Playset with Sonic, and my kid is over the moon about it! The playset is this rad Death Egg thing, and Sonic is just tearing it up with his cool moves. It's been non-stop action since we got it, and my kiddo is totally hooked – definitely a win in the toy department!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The instructions are terrible. No clear guidance on the assembly. The only action the toy itself has is when the egg mobile crashes from pressing the button at the base of the death egg. As for Sonic himself, there’s nothing to make him circle the death egg itself, you have to manually move him through the tracks. You also have to manually switch the direction of the tracks/sonic. The tracks do twist, but I don’t see the reason. My son has played with it, but it’s not anything to keep him entertained for more than 10-15 mins. I wouldn’t buy it over again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks awesome on display!
reviews.reviewText: This Sonic playset is awesome! I got it for my son who loves Sonic the Hedgehog and he was stoked. He doesn't really play with toys anymore, so he is displaying this set with his other Sonic figures he collects. It's a lot bigger than I was expecting, so his dad had to add a bigger shelf to place it on, but so worth it, it looks super cool. The death egg shell and tracks were a bit of pain for my son to assemble by himself, but we got it done together. So if you buy this for a child, they will most likely need help building it. The death egg looks amazing, very detailed and it's definitely solid. It comes with two figures, Dr.Eggman and Sonic. The track works great, Sonic runs around it very smoothly. My son loves it, the playset is his new favorite piece to his Sonic collection. Overall very happy with it and would recommend. Would make a great gift for any Sonic fan as a toy or to put on display.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Gift for My Three Year Old that Loves Sonic
reviews.reviewText: My son who turned three recently has been into Sonic the Hedgehog for quite some time now. He loves watching him on television and watching me play the video game since he is not old enough yet to play himself. When I saw this pop up in my feed, I knew this would be the perfect gift for him to have the opportunity to play with Sonic.The death egg itself is pretty large. I have a good spot for it in his room and it is pretty awesome. It comes with a little Sonic and the aim is to get to the heart where Dr. Eggman is living. It is a joy to watch him play and it keeps him busy for a good number of hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I brought it for my grandson he loves it

The media could not be loaded. Juguete de muy mala calidad. La pieza de arriba no ajusta bien y se cae, impidiendo que el sonic pueda dar toda la vuelta. El lanzador, muy flojo para que salte tienes que hacer varios intentos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Toy doesn’t work - no option to contact seller
reviews.reviewText: Toy doesn’t fit together properly so doesn’t work - no way of contacting seller - one very upset child!

The media could not be loaded. Gioco difficile da montare (le istruzioni dei giochi di sonic a quanto pare sono tutte scritte male e non intuitive) quindi ho dovuto vedere un video su YouTube per capire dove fosse l'errore, ma anche il ragazzo che faceva la review ha ammesso che è un gioco senza senso, soprattutto contando quato costa.Sonic si deve muovere con le mani, ma, solo una delle due "scie" funziona (questa è una parolona, perché non funziona niente in realtà) o comunque ci si regge meglio la statuina di sonic. Quando questa arriva in basso, premendo un bottone con difficoltà si riesce a toccare un pulsante sotto ad Eggman e finalmente il robot - uovo nel quale si trova, si disassembla. Di un meccanico e poco intuitivo unici! Tra tutti i giochi di sonic l'unico carino è davvero funzionante è quello di Gian Eggman che si vede sullo sfondo del tavolino. Sconsiglio il gioco. Non metto una stella solo perché i due personaggi all'interno almeno si possono usare per altre avventure di fantasia e mio figlio, per fortuna, ne ha molta quindi li userà in altri modi!
